org.symboltable

Class BFSearcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.symboltable.BFSearcher

  • public class BFSearcher
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs Breadth First Search (BFS) algorithm from source sourceVertex on a graph graph. After pre-processing the graph, can process shortest path queries from any vertex vertex to sourceVertex.
    Author:
    shivam

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BFSearcher(Graph graph, java.lang.String sourceVertex)
      Run BFS in graph graph from given source vertex sourceVertex.
